snippet: Pilot programs to reduce mortgage principal were ended abruptly by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, according to the documents released on Tuesday.
abstract: Documents show that pilot programs approved and initiated by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to reduce homeowner debt and save taxpayers millions were halted before the trials had progressed far enough to measure success.
lead_paragraph: Pilot programs to reduce mortgage principal were ended abruptly by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, according to the documents released on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Mortgage Aid Pilot Programs Were Halted, Papers Show
headline.main: Mortgage Aid Programs Were Halted, Papers Show
headline.print_headline: Mortgage Aid Programs Were Halted, Papers Show

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
